title: Causes of death revealed in Stafford murder-suicide that left 4 dead
content:
STAFFORD, VA (WWBT) -
The four people found dead in a Stafford home last week each died from a gunshot wound to the head, the Medical Examiner's Office said Monday.
On Thursday morning, the Stafford Sheriff's Office found 35-year-old Lance C. Buckley, 30-year-old Amy Buckley, 5-year-old Claire Buckley and 17-month-old Abigail Buckley dead in their home in the Wilderness Court neighborhood.
The sheriff's office says a man called 911 to report three murders and a suicide at the home.
"He then identified himself as Lance Buckley and hung up the phone," the sheriff's office said Friday.
The sheriff's office says when deputies arrived they found the four bodies in the lower level of the home.
